list.title: Does the Ears To You van visit me at my home?
list.description: You bet. Once an appointment is scheduled, Ears To You® will come directly to your home. Our mobile hearing clinic is fully outfitted with all of the necessary diagnostic and audiological equipment needed to test hearing, prescribe and program hearing aids. We also provide consultation on the care and maintenance practices for hearing aids.

list.title: How long do I have to wait for my appointment?
list.description: We aim to see you at a time that works best for you—on your schedule, at your home. Our full service model and to-your-door method of delivery ensures that care is catered and customized to your needs. Wait time for an appointment can often be less than 24 hours.

list.title: I am in a wheelchair and have limited mobility. Will I be able to use your service?
list.description: Yes! We have a fully operational integrated wheelchair lift in our van. We can cater to any mobility need.

list.title: Do you have cleaning and sanitizing standards and procedures before and after every visit?
list.description: Yes, it is important to us that we practice safe cleaning methods in order to maintain the safety of our clients as well as ourselves. Between each visit, our hearing clinic and all surfaces are disinfected adhering to Health Canada protocols and procedures. Your health and safety is our number one concern.
